Class java.lang.String

Added Constructors
String(byte[], int) Allocates a new {@code String} containing characters constructed from an array of 8-bit integer values.
String(byte[], int, int, int) Allocates a new {@code String} constructed from a subarray of an array of 8-bit integer values.
 

Changed Constructors
String(byte[], Charset) Change in exceptions thrown from java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException to no exceptions.
 Constructs a new {@code String} by decoding the specified array of bytes using the specified java.nio.charset.Charset charset.
 

Added Methods
String format(String, Object[]) Returns a formatted string using the specified format string and arguments.
String format(Locale, String, Object[]) Returns a formatted string using the specified locale, format string, and arguments.
void getBytes(int, int, byte[], int) Copies characters from this string into the destination byte array.
